column4: do you know where the database is stored? maybe its in the your directory.. have you check there?
as in remove a package?
basically i;ve got this database error with digikama if i run apt-get remove digikam --purge and then reinstall i still get the same error msg
what is the error message... paste in the pastebin if its too long..
failed to update old database to new database format
it happened when i try to change the  "My Albums" directory
Umm not sure where the DB is mate
i just ran --purge, autoremove, clean & orphaned apps and reinstalled and still the same problem
i have never used the program though... hmmm..,,, can you wait while I google around?
yeh mate would be great if you could - kinda makes me feel lazy haha i've done a little googling and google only gave 1 page and no answer
hehe.. ok. wish me luck then
lol good luck
